effects: Act 776 of 2025 is an appropriation act for the Administrative Office of the Courts for FY 2026.  In addition to general operating appropriations, specific sections provide funding for drug court enhancement, accountability court programs, adult drug‑court expenses and specialty courts【556692708300381†L661-L679】【556692708300381†L739-L776】.  These appropriations ensure that the AOC has resources for court operations, specialty court programs, and associated support services.
